```{r}
library(rgdal)
library(leaflet)
library(raster)

```


```{r}
base1 <- shapefile("Accidentalidad_2015.shp",encoding="UTF-8",use_iconv=TRUE)
base2 <- shapefile("Accidentalidad_2016.shp",encoding="UTF-8",use_iconv=TRUE)
base1 <- shapefile("Accidentalidad_2017.shp",encoding="UTF-8",use_iconv=TRUE)
```


```{r}
base <- base1@data[-c(1,2,3,4,5,8,10,11,12,13,15,16,17)]
base <- na.omit(base)
base$DIA <- as.factor(base$DIA)
base$HORA <- as.factor((base$HORA))
base$CLASE <- as.factor(base$CLASE)
base$GRAVEDAD <- as.factor(base$GRAVEDAD)

```
